reviews.customers_say: Customers find this corduroy dress cute and well-made, with a velvety fabric that's comfortable and flattering. The dress is great for casual fall wear, and one customer mentions it's particularly good for hiding an apple shape. While the length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect and others saying it's too short for their age. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Comfy & Perfect
items.body: The Opemiby Corduroy Button-Up Empire Waist Dress is such a cozy, flattering piece. The corduroy fabric gives it a soft, warm feel that’s perfect for fall, and the 3/4 sleeves make it easy to wear in cooler weather without feeling too heavy. The empire waist is really flattering and gives the dress a nice shape without feeling tight. The button-up front adds a cute, vintage touch, and it’s one of those dresses you can style with boots, tights, or even sneakers and still look effortlessly put together. If you want something comfortable, seasonal, and adorable for everyday wear or casual outings, this dress is a great pick. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: CMML

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got tons of compliments!
items.body: The quality is amazing! The fabric is a velvety corduroy. Very charming. Not hot, breathable. Would HIGHLY recommend! I got a size XL, it was loose fitting, just how I wanted. Could’ve easily sized down, depending on your style. Read more
items.author: Johanna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but short
items.body: Originally purchased the small but it was way too short and I'm only 5'1. The medium was the perfect length but a little to oversized everywhere else. Great casual fall dress though. Read more
items.author: TraHow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute comfortable dress/top
items.body: Beautiful color, soft fabric. I wished I had ordered one size larger, but it is still wearable. Looks good with tall boots. Length is a little short for my age but I will wear with leggings. Read more
items.author: JO

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute
items.body: So cute and comfy, true to size Read more
items.author: Amber Schexnayder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes!!! Buy this!!!
items.body: This dress is the cutest! It is a good length I'm 5'1 so alot of dresses hit way longer, but this one hits just right. Super comfy! Not clingy, definitely forgiving, but still cute!! Material is nice, as expected. I will be grabbing another one of these in another color! Read more
items.author: Kristal Nuzum

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Casual dress
items.body: Fits nice but is a thin material and the quality is cheap. Color is nice. Read more
items.author: Brian Ronan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute for a night out
items.body: This dress is very nice quality. I am only 5’1, so it was a little long on me. But it is so cute if you are just a little taller. Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Ashley Kinney

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gold Flame, Khaki, Blue, Vineyard Green, Burgundy, Apricot, Sage Green, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
